title: 'ONE Championship 100: Century – Part 1' live results (8 p.m. ET)
text:
“ONE Championship 100: Century – Part 1” takes place Sunday in Japan, and you can join us for live results of all of the action.

Part of a massive, two-event lineup for the promotion, the card takes place at Ryogoku Kokugikan in Tokyo. The prelims stream on B/R Live at 8 p.m. ET, while the main card airs on TNT at 11 p.m. ET.

In the main event, women’s atomweight champion Angela Lee (9-1) puts her belt on the line against current strawweight champion Jing Nan Xiong (13-1).

Additionally, Demetrious Johnson (29-3-1) looks to claim the ONE Championship flyweight grand prix title when he meets Danny Kingad (13-1) in the tournament final.

Enjoy the fights, everyone.

The “ONE Championship 100: Century – Part 1” MMA lineup includes:

MAIN CARD (TNT, 11 p.m. ET)

Champ Angela Lee vs. Jing Nan Xiong – for women’s atomweight title

Demetrious Johnson vs. Danny Kingad – flyweight grand prix final

Christian Lee vs. Saygid Guseyn Arslanaliev – lightweight grand prix final

PRELIMINARY CARD (B/R Live, 8 p.m. ET)
description: "ONE Championship 100: Century – Part 1" takes place Sunday in Japan, and you can join us for live results of all of the action.
